trans-unit.source: The app needs to modify the system configuration to save the edited display data.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacija mora spremeniti konfiguracijo sistema, da shrani urejene zaslonske podatke.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Access to a File Provide Domain Usage Description

trans-unit.id: %@ %lld additional color modes are available with different refresh rates.
trans-unit.source: %1$@ %2$lld additional color modes are available with different refresh rates.
trans-unit.target: %1$@ %2$lld so na voljo dodatni barvni načini z različnimi stopnjami osveževanja.

trans-unit.id: %@ Built-in display panels have a single fixed internal connection mode.
trans-unit.source: %@ Built-in display panels have a single fixed internal connection mode.
trans-unit.target: %@ Vgrajene zaslonske plošče imajo en fiksni način notranje povezave.

trans-unit.id: %@ Certain displays are set to hide the menu bar icon, which may override this setting.
trans-unit.source: %@ Certain displays are set to hide the menu bar icon, which may override this setting.
trans-unit.target: %@ Nekateri zasloni so nastavljeni tako, da skrijejo ikono menijske vrstice, kar lahko preglasi to nastavitev.

trans-unit.id: %@ Configuration Protection can make color mode changes persistent.
trans-unit.source: %@ Configuration Protection can make color mode changes persistent.
trans-unit.target: %@ Zaščita konfiguracije lahko povzroči obstojnost sprememb barvnega načina.

trans-unit.id: %@ Connection color depth (%lld-bit) is lower than the framebuffer depth (%u-bit). The GPU may use temporal dithering to improve colors.
trans-unit.source: %1$@ Connection color depth (%2$lld-bit) is lower than the framebuffer depth (%3$u-bit). The GPU may use temporal dithering to improve colors.
trans-unit.target: %1$@ Barvna globina povezave (%2$lld-bit) je nižja od globine okvirnega medpomnilnika (%3$u-bit). GPE lahko za izboljšanje barv uporablja časovno mehljanje.

trans-unit.id: %@ Display group layout protection is in effect. This might alter or override the result of a move operation!
trans-unit.source: %@ Display group layout protection is in effect. This might alter or override the result of a move operation!
trans-unit.target: %@ Zaščita postavitve skupine zaslona je v veljavi. To lahko spremeni ali preglasi rezultat operacije premikanja!
%@ Kontrolniki za prilagajanje slike niso na voljo.

trans-unit.id: %@ NTSC (or other unexposed) refresh rates may not persist after mode-changes unless forced by %@ Configuration Protection.
trans-unit.source: %1$@ NTSC (or other unexposed) refresh rates may not persist after mode-changes unless forced by %2$@ Configuration Protection.
trans-unit.target: Stopnje osveževanja %1$@ NTSC (ali druge neizpostavljene) po spremembah načina morda ne bodo vztrajale, razen če jih prisili %2$@ zaščita konfiguracije.

trans-unit.id: %@ Negotiated mode may differ from the listed parameters. Check visuals or display OSD info.
trans-unit.source: %@ Negotiated mode may differ from the listed parameters. Check visuals or display OSD info.
trans-unit.target: %@ Dogovorjeni način se lahko razlikuje od navedenih parametrov. Preverite vizualno ali zaslon za informacije OSD.

trans-unit.id: %@ Software XDR upscaling is active for extra brightness while native upscaling is also available. Enable the %@ preset for a better experience!
trans-unit.source: %@ Software XDR upscaling is active for extra brightness while native upscaling is also available. Enable the %@ preset for a better experience!
trans-unit.target: %@ Višanje ločljivosti programske opreme XDR je aktivno za dodatno svetlost, na voljo pa je tudi izvorno višanje ločljivosti. Omogočite prednastavitev %@ za boljšo izkušnjo!

trans-unit.id: %@ Some adjustments may clip HDR content!
trans-unit.source: %@ Some adjustments may clip HDR content!
trans-unit.target: %@ Nekatere prilagoditve lahko izrežejo vsebino HDR!
%@ Tok se samodejno zažene na povezanem zaslonu!

trans-unit.id: %@ The app is disengaged from native volume and mute keys.
trans-unit.source: %@ The app is disengaged from native volume and mute keys.
trans-unit.target: %@ Aplikacija je izključena iz izvirnih tipk za glasnost in izklop zvoka.

trans-unit.target: %@ Aplikacija posluša tipke za glasnost (če pravice dovoljujejo), ne pa tudi tipke za izklop zvoka.

trans-unit.id: %@ The app listens to the native brightness keys (if permissions permit).
trans-unit.source: %@ The app listens to the native brightness keys (if permissions permit).
trans-unit.target: %@ Aplikacija posluša izvorne tipke za svetlost (če pravice dovoljujejo).

trans-unit.id: %@ The app listens to the volume keys (if permissions permit) but not the mute key.
trans-unit.source: %@ The app listens to the volume keys (if permissions permit) but not the mute key.
trans-unit.target: %@ Aplikacija posluša tipke za glasnost (če pravice dovoljujejo), ne pa tudi tipke za izklop zvoka.

trans-unit.source: %@ The mouse hovers over the streamed content and does not interact with it.
trans-unit.target: %@ Miška se pomakne nad pretočno vsebino in z njo ne deluje.

trans-unit.source: %1$@ This license is currently active on %2$lld installations.
trans-unit.target: %1$@ Ta licenca je trenutno aktivna pri namestitvah %2$lld.

trans-unit.id: %@ Use ⌘ Command + Click to warp the mouse cursor to the source screen!
trans-unit.source: %@ Use ⌘ Command + Click to warp the mouse cursor to the source screen!
trans-unit.target: %@ Uporabite ukaz ⌘ + klik, da premaknete kazalec miške na izvorni zaslon!

trans-unit.target: %@ Za hitro identifikacijo uporabite možnost ⌥ + kliknite na glavo menija zaslona.

trans-unit.id: %@ is unable to detect any display. This might indicate an application or system error.
trans-unit.source: %@ is unable to detect any display. This might indicate an application or system error.

%1$lld slikovnih pik HiDPI (%2$lld slikovnih pik LoDPI)

trans-unit.id:
**%@ License Issue Detected**
This installation has been remotely deactivated, or the hardware identifiers have changed since the last license activation. This may have occurred due to a hardware upgrade or migration to a new device.
Please reactivate this installation to continue using Pro features.
trans-unit.source:
**%@ License Issue Detected**
This installation has been remotely deactivated, or the hardware identifiers have changed since the last license activation. This may have occurred due to a hardware upgrade or migration to a new device.
Please reactivate this installation to continue using Pro features.
trans-unit.target:
**%@ Zaznana je bila težava z licenco**
Ta namestitev je bila deaktivirana na daljavo ali pa so se identifikatorji strojne opreme spremenili od zadnje aktivacije licence. To se je morda zgodilo zaradi nadgradnje strojne opreme ali selitve na novo napravo.
Če želite še naprej uporabljati funkcije Pro, znova aktivirajte to namestitev.

trans-unit.id: A display group can cover all displays (with an optionally specified list of exceptions) or may consist of a specific list of displays. Display group membership may determine the activation status of the display group (depending on activation policy settings) and influence how display group based features behave.
trans-unit.source: A display group can cover all displays (with an optionally specified list of exceptions) or may consist of a specific list of displays. Display group membership may determine the activation status of the display group (depending on activation policy settings) and influence how display group based features behave.
trans-unit.target: Skupina zaslonov lahko zajema vse zaslone (z izbirno določenim seznamom izjem) ali pa je sestavljena iz določenega seznama zaslonov. Članstvo v skupini zaslonov lahko določi stanje aktivacije skupine zaslonov (odvisno od nastavitev pravilnika za aktiviranje) in vpliva na obnašanje funkcij, ki temeljijo na skupini zaslonov.

trans-unit.id: A display group with the name '%@' already exists.
trans-unit.source: A display group with the name '%@' already exists.
trans-unit.target: Skupina zaslona z imenom '%@' že obstaja.

trans-unit.id: A display is present which is not fully controllable without the app
trans-unit.source: A display is present which is not fully controllable without the app
trans-unit.target: Prisoten je zaslon, ki ga brez aplikacije ni mogoče popolnoma nadzorovati

trans-unit.id: A higher priority display group marked as exclusive is active.
trans-unit.source: A higher priority display group marked as exclusive is active.
trans-unit.target: Aktivna je skupina zaslonov z višjo prioriteto, označena kot ekskluzivna.

trans-unit.id: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.
trans-unit.source: A less than 720p desktop resolution is not ideal for macOS usability as GUI elements might not fit. This affects virtual screens as well as the resolution slider for displays.
trans-unit.target: Ločljivost namizja, manjša od 720p, ni idealna za uporabnost macOS, saj elementi GUI morda ne ustrezajo. To vpliva na virtualne zaslone in tudi na drsnik ločljivosti za zaslone.

trans-unit.id: A popup notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.
trans-unit.source: A popup notification will appear when the app detects interference from other apps that adjust the color table. Useful for troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: Ko aplikacija zazna motnje drugih aplikacij, ki prilagajajo barvno tabelo, se prikaže pojavno obvestilo. Uporabno za odpravljanje težav.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen is similar to a real display but exists only in the virtual space (in the computer's memory). You can use it to show it in a PIP window, stream or mirror its content to a real display or use it as a source for screen recording or screencast via an appropriate app.
trans-unit.target: Navidezni zaslon je podoben pravemu zaslonu, vendar obstaja samo v navideznem prostoru (v pomnilniku računalnika). Uporabite ga lahko za prikaz v oknu PIP, pretakanje ali zrcaljenje njegove vsebine na pravi zaslon ali pa ga uporabite kot vir za snemanje zaslona ali predvajanje zaslona prek ustrezne aplikacije.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect or disconnect when the associated display is connected or disconnected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Navidezni zaslon, ki je povezan z zaslonom, se bo samodejno povezal ali prekinil, ko je povezani zaslon povezan ali prekinjen. Za povezane virtualne zaslone lahko onemogočite samodejno povezovanje.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically connect when the associated display is connected. All other virtual screens were connected. You can disable auto-connect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Navidezni zaslon, ki je povezan z zaslonom, se samodejno poveže, ko je povezan povezani zaslon. Vsi drugi virtualni zasloni so bili povezani. Za povezane virtualne zaslone lahko onemogočite samodejno povezovanje.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will automatically disconnect when the associated display is disconnected. All other virtual screens were disconnected. You can disable auto-disconnect for associated virtual screens.
trans-unit.target: Navidezni zaslon, ki je povezan z zaslonom, bo samodejno prekinil povezavo, ko je povezan zaslon prekinjen. Vsi drugi virtualni zasloni so bili prekinjeni. Za povezane virtualne zaslone lahko onemogočite samodejno prekinitev povezave.

trans-unit.id: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will connect or disconnect automatically when the associated display is connected or disconnected.
trans-unit.source: A virtual screen which is associated with a display will connect or disconnect automatically when the associated display is connected or disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Navidezni zaslon, ki je povezan z zaslonom, se bo samodejno povezal ali prekinil, ko je povezani zaslon povezan ali prekinjen.
Dostopnost je konfigurirana – potreben ponovni zagon aplikacije

trans-unit.id: Accessibility Permissions are configured but the **app still needs to be restarted** for the changes to take effect! Please close and restart the app when it is convenient or press the "Restart %@" button below to restart the app immediately!
trans-unit.source: Accessibility Permissions are configured but the **app still needs to be restarted** for the changes to take effect! Please close and restart the app when it is convenient or press the "Restart %@" button below to restart the app immediately!
trans-unit.target: Dovoljenja za dostopnost so konfigurirana, vendar je **aplikacijo še vedno treba znova zagnati**, da spremembe začnejo veljati! Zaprite in znova zaženite aplikacijo, ko je to primerno, ali pa pritisnite spodnji gumb »Znova zaženi %@«, da takoj znova zaženete aplikacijo!

trans-unit.id: Accessibility Permissions are properly configured. Native (Apple) keyboard brightness and volume keys should work if these features are otherwise set up. If not, please try restarting the app!
trans-unit.source: Accessibility Permissions are properly configured. Native (Apple) keyboard brightness and volume keys should work if these features are otherwise set up. If not, please try restarting the app!
trans-unit.target: Dovoljenja za dostopnost so pravilno konfigurirana. Tipke za osvetlitev in glasnost izvirne (Apple) tipkovnice bi morale delovati, če so te funkcije drugače nastavljene. Če ne, poskusite znova zagnati aplikacijo!

trans-unit.id: Activated only when the display is not set as main so it does not interfere with the lock screen. Most displays do not support turning the backlight off or back on via DDC.
trans-unit.source: Activated only when the display is not set as main so it does not interfere with the lock screen. Most displays do not support turning the backlight off or back on via DDC.
trans-unit.target: Aktivira se le, če zaslon ni nastavljen kot glavni, tako da ne moti zaklenjenega zaslona. Večina zaslonov ne podpira izklopa ali ponovnega vklopa osvetlitve ozadja prek DDC.

trans-unit.id: Activation depends on enabled synchronization, UI scale matching or layout protection for this display group.
trans-unit.source: Activation depends on enabled synchronization, UI scale matching or layout protection for this display group.
trans-unit.target: Aktivacija je odvisna od omogočene sinhronizacije, ujemanja merila uporabniškega vmesnika ali zaščite postavitve za to skupino zaslona.

trans-unit.id: Activation requires the presence of appropriate displays for a configured synchronization, UI scale matching or layout protection.
trans-unit.source: Activation requires the presence of appropriate displays for a configured synchronization, UI scale matching or layout protection.
trans-unit.target: Aktivacija zahteva prisotnost ustreznih zaslonov za konfigurirano sinhronizacijo, ujemanje merila uporabniškega vmesnika ali zaščito postavitve.

trans-unit.id: Add and remove favorite resolutions via long press
trans-unit.source: Add and remove favorite resolutions via long press
trans-unit.target: Dodajte in odstranite priljubljene resolucije z dolgim ​​pritiskom

trans-unit.id: Add the app under System Settings > Privacy & Security > Screen Recording!

trans-unit.target: Dodatna zakasnitev po prebujanju za ponovno uporabo nastavitev DDC

trans-unit.target: Dodatne možnosti so na voljo v razdelku »Nadzor strojne opreme« zaslona za to funkcijo.

trans-unit.id: Adds additional resolutions on some configurations but usually just breaks the slider. Affects resolution keyboard shortcuts as well.
trans-unit.source: Adds additional resolutions on some configurations but usually just breaks the slider. Affects resolution keyboard shortcuts as well.
trans-unit.target: Doda dodatne ločljivosti pri nekaterih konfiguracijah, vendar običajno samo prekine drsnik. Vpliva tudi na bližnjice na tipkovnici za ločljivost.

trans-unit.id: Adjust the offset of the two displays by modifying the anchor points. Layout protection tries to arrange the displays so they line up at the defined anchor points horizontally or vertically. The default setting is to line up displays in a centered way.
trans-unit.source: Adjust the offset of the two displays by modifying the anchor points. Layout protection tries to arrange the displays so they line up at the defined anchor points horizontally or vertically. The default setting is to line up displays in a centered way.
trans-unit.target: Prilagodite zamik obeh zaslonov s spreminjanjem sidrnih točk. Zaščita postavitve poskuša razporediti zaslone tako, da se poravnajo na definiranih sidrnih točkah vodoravno ali navpično. Privzeta nastavitev je poravnava zaslonov na sredini.

trans-unit.id: Advanced settings, watched & affected group members

trans-unit.target: Napredne nastavitve, opazovani in prizadeti člani skupine

trans-unit.id:
After discarding a virtual screen, it is recommended to remove its unused factory color profile as well.
You can do this in System Settings or the app can do it for you (administrator credentials needed).
trans-unit.source:
After discarding a virtual screen, it is recommended to remove its unused factory color profile as well.
You can do this in System Settings or the app can do it for you (administrator credentials needed).
trans-unit.target:
Ko zavržete virtualni zaslon, je priporočljivo odstraniti tudi njegov neuporabljen tovarniški barvni profil.
To lahko storite v sistemskih nastavitvah ali pa aplikacija namesto vas (potrebne so skrbniške poverilnice).

trans-unit.id: After discarding the virtual screen, it is recommended to remove its unused factory color profile in System Settings.
trans-unit.source: After discarding the virtual screen, it is recommended to remove its unused factory color profile in System Settings.
trans-unit.target: Ko zavržete virtualni zaslon, je priporočljivo, da v sistemskih nastavitvah odstranite njegov neuporabljen tovarniški barvni profil.

trans-unit.source: Allow sending crash logs to the developer automatically. Crash logs do not contain any personal data but may contain hardware specific data. Crash logs are handled by Sentry ([sentry.io/privacy](https://sentry.io/privacy)).

trans-unit.id: Close the expanded menu item when the app menu is closed. Disabling this preserves the menu layout for the next time the app menu is opened.

trans-unit.id: Color changes, upscaling and dimming via color table adjustments clip HDR content. With this enabled, the app resets the color table when no adjustments are needed. This might be distracting or cause a black screen on some configurations.
trans-unit.source: Color changes, upscaling and dimming via color table adjustments clip HDR content. With this enabled, the app resets the color table when no adjustments are needed. This might be distracting or cause a black screen on some configurations.

trans-unit.id: Combine hardware brightness control (if available), software dimming and XDR/HDR upscaling into one unified brightness control.
trans-unit.source: Combine hardware brightness control (if available), software dimming and XDR/HDR upscaling into one unified brightness control.
trans-unit.target: Združite strojni nadzor svetlosti (če je na voljo), programsko zatemnitev in povečanje XDR/HDR v en enoten nadzor svetlosti.

trans-unit.id: Combined brightness - XDR/HDR upscaling maximum scale value
trans-unit.source: Combined brightness - XDR/HDR upscaling maximum scale value

trans-unit.id: Combined brightness - minimum allowed hardware brightness level

trans-unit.id: Combined brightness - software dimming switchover point

trans-unit.source: Combined brightness is not required with default settings as the native XDR brightness scale covers the entire configurable scale. Use only if you want to fine-tune the dimming curve below the configured XDR brightness scale minimum

trans-unit.id: Compresses the allowed software brightness range between the specified value and 100%, affecting the software component of combined brightness control as well. This helps avoid accidentally setting the software brightness level too low or to zero.

trans-unit.source: Configure virtual screen/stream rotation - useful for portrait Sidecar or for displays that do not support changing orientation. With Sidecar you can decide whether the USB-C port (lightning connector) should face up or down.

trans-unit.id: Create a virtual screen that matches to the aspect ratio of another display and associate the virtual screen with the display. Best for a scenario when the virtual screen should be streamed (e.g. portrait Sidecar) or mirrored to a display.
trans-unit.source: Create a virtual screen that matches to the aspect ratio of another display and associate the virtual screen with the display. Best for a scenario when the virtual screen should be streamed (e.g. portrait Sidecar) or mirrored to a display.

trans-unit.source: Create both LoDPI and HiDPI variants of each resolutions. Enabling HiDPI will also create a pixel-doubled LoDPI version for each resolution option.

Ustvarite LoDPI in HiDPI različici vsake ločljivosti. Če omogočite HiDPI, boste ustvarili tudi različico LoDPI s podvojenimi slikovnimi pikami za vsako možnost ločljivosti.

S seznamom ločljivosti po meri z različnimi razmerji stranic je lahko dejanska prijavljena velikost drugačna.

Zasloni bodo nekaj časa prazni in ne boste mogli komunicirati z računalnikom Mac. Postopek traja približno 2-4 sekunde.

trans-unit.id: EDID, or Extended Display Identification Data, is a standard for displays to convey their capabilities to a connected computer, including resolution, supported video formats, timings, and manufacturer information.
trans-unit.source: EDID, or Extended Display Identification Data, is a standard for displays to convey their capabilities to a connected computer, including resolution, supported video formats, timings, and manufacturer information.
trans-unit.target: EDID ali Extended Display Identification Data je standard za prikaze za prenos svojih zmogljivosti na povezani računalnik, vključno z ločljivostjo, podprtimi video formati, časi in informacijami o proizvajalcu.

trans-unit.id: Enables resolutions up to 16Kx16K (8Kx8K HiDPI) for virtual screens and flexible scaling. Using 8K+ virtual screens might cause stability issues. Flexible scaling needs to be reapplied. Maximum native resolutions have limitations depending on specific macOS version and GPU type.
trans-unit.source: Enables resolutions up to 16Kx16K (8Kx8K HiDPI) for virtual screens and flexible scaling. Using 8K+ virtual screens might cause stability issues. Flexible scaling needs to be reapplied. Maximum native resolutions have limitations depending on specific macOS version and GPU type.
trans-unit.target: Omogoča ločljivosti do 16Kx16K (8Kx8K HiDPI) za virtualne zaslone in prilagodljivo skaliranje. Uporaba virtualnih zaslonov 8K+ lahko povzroči težave s stabilnostjo. Znova je treba uporabiti prilagodljivo skaliranje. Največje izvorne ločljivosti imajo omejitve glede na določeno različico macOS in vrsto GPE.

trans-unit.id: Enabling this option removes the menu bar icon when only this and other similarly marked displays are present. Use this setting when you don't need any of the app's features for this display and want to free up menu bar space.
trans-unit.source: Enabling this option removes the menu bar icon when only this and other similarly marked displays are present. Use this setting when you don't need any of the app's features for this display and want to free up menu bar space.

trans-unit.source: Fully expands the available brightness range for SDR content at a system level and allows for more dimming range as well. Superior to all other upscaling methods. When inactive, the app falls back to software based XDR upscaling methods.

trans-unit.source: If Dock visibility is set to 'Never', the Edit menu and Copy/Paste keyboard shortcut keys will not be available in Settings.

trans-unit.id: If configured, the token must be specified in the URL (see [documentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)). This prevents external links to perform unwanted actions.
trans-unit.source: If configured, the token must be specified in the URL (see [documentation](https://betterdisplay.pro/integration)). This prevents external links to perform unwanted actions.

trans-unit.id: If disabled, Quit %@ is listed in the Tools menu.
trans-unit.source: If disabled, Quit %@ is listed in the Tools menu.
trans-unit.target: Če je onemogočeno, je Zapri %@ navedeno v meniju Orodja.

trans-unit.id: If keyboard control is set to the display that matches the current audio device name (set this up under Keyboard settings), this value will be used for audio device matching instead of the display name.
trans-unit.source: If keyboard control is set to the display that matches the current audio device name (set this up under Keyboard settings), this value will be used for audio device matching instead of the display name.
trans-unit.target: Če je nadzor tipkovnice nastavljen na zaslon, ki se ujema s trenutnim imenom zvočne naprave (to nastavite v nastavitvah tipkovnice), bo ta vrednost uporabljena za ujemanje zvočne naprave namesto imena za prikaz.

trans-unit.id: If no perfect resolution is available for perfect scale matching, the app will look for the closest resolution in the vicinity within the given tolerance.
trans-unit.source: If no perfect resolution is available for perfect scale matching, the app will look for the closest resolution in the vicinity within the given tolerance.
trans-unit.target: Če popolna ločljivost ni na voljo za popolno ujemanje merila, bo aplikacija poiskala najbližjo ločljivost v bližini znotraj podane tolerance.

trans-unit.id: If source and target control ranges differ, synchronized values are remapped (rebased) accordingly.
trans-unit.source: If source and target control ranges differ, synchronized values are remapped (rebased) accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Če se izvorna in ciljna kontrolna območja razlikujejo, so sinhronizirane vrednosti ustrezno preslikane (ponovno osnovane).

trans-unit.id: If the display factory reset was performed properly, you should also reset all stored app DDC values to defaults.
trans-unit.source: If the display factory reset was performed properly, you should also reset all stored app DDC values to defaults.
trans-unit.target: Če je bila ponastavitev zaslona na tovarniške nastavitve izvedena pravilno, morate ponastaviti tudi vse shranjene vrednosti DDC aplikacije na privzete vrednosti.

trans-unit.id: If the display is used as a "Television" (as opposed to "Computer monitor"), it won't be affected by Night Shift and True Tone.
trans-unit.source: If the display is used as a "Television" (as opposed to "Computer monitor"), it won't be affected by Night Shift and True Tone.
trans-unit.target: Če se zaslon uporablja kot "televizor" (v nasprotju z "računalniškim monitorjem"), Night Shift in True Tone nanj ne bosta vplivala.

trans-unit.id: If the menu icon is hidden, you can reveal the icon by re-launching the app while the app is already running.
trans-unit.source: If the menu icon is hidden, you can reveal the icon by re-launching the app while the app is already running.
trans-unit.target: Če je ikona menija skrita, jo lahko razkrijete tako, da znova zaženete aplikacijo, ko se aplikacija že izvaja.

trans-unit.id: If the updated EDID contains new display identity (serial number, model ID, vendor ID), macOS will treat the display as a separate display. With this option enabled, %@ preserves continuity between the old and new identity during the current app session.
trans-unit.source: If the updated EDID contains new display identity (serial number, model ID, vendor ID), macOS will treat the display as a separate display. With this option enabled, %@ preserves continuity between the old and new identity during the current app session.
trans-unit.target: Če posodobljeni EDID vsebuje novo identiteto zaslona (serijsko številko, ID modela, ID proizvajalca), bo macOS obravnaval zaslon kot ločen zaslon. Ko je ta možnost omogočena, %@ ohrani kontinuiteto med staro in novo identiteto med trenutno sejo aplikacije.

trans-unit.id: If this display group is active, no other display groups with lower priority can be active. If any other display group with higher priority is active, this display group cannot be active.
trans-unit.source: If this display group is active, no other display groups with lower priority can be active. If any other display group with higher priority is active, this display group cannot be active.
trans-unit.target: Če je ta skupina prikazov aktivna, nobena druga skupina prikazov z nižjo prioriteto ne more biti aktivna. Če je aktivna katera koli druga skupina prikazov z višjo prioriteto, ta skupina prikazov ne more biti aktivna.

trans-unit.id: If you are using Notification Center, make sure notifications are enabled for the app. Important notifications may appear silently, depending on varius circumstances. Traditional popups may contain additional information.
trans-unit.source: If you are using Notification Center, make sure notifications are enabled for the app. Important notifications may appear silently, depending on varius circumstances. Traditional popups may contain additional information.
trans-unit.target: Če uporabljate center za obvestila, se prepričajte, da so obvestila omogočena za aplikacijo. Pomembna obvestila se lahko prikažejo tiho, odvisno od različnih okoliščin. Tradicionalna pojavna okna lahko vsebujejo dodatne informacije.

trans-unit.id: If you would like to use the virtual screens later, it is better to use disconnect so macOS display configuration data is preserved.
trans-unit.source: If you would like to use the virtual screens later, it is better to use disconnect so macOS display configuration data is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Če želite navidezne zaslone uporabiti pozneje, je bolje uporabiti prekinitev povezave, da se ohranijo podatki o konfiguraciji zaslona macOS.

trans-unit.id: If your configuration relies on configuration protection for standard operation, you might want to mute notifications about it.
trans-unit.source: If your configuration relies on configuration protection for standard operation, you might want to mute notifications about it.
trans-unit.target: Če vaša konfiguracija temelji na zaščiti konfiguracije za standardno delovanje, boste morda želeli utišati obvestila o tem.

trans-unit.id:
If your display is not fully compatible with this feature, the app may not be able to turn the backlight off or turn it back on again!
Not all displays support DDC power operations. DDC power operations can cause (even serious) issues with some displays!
trans-unit.source:
If your display is not fully compatible with this feature, the app may not be able to turn the backlight off or turn it back on again!
Not all displays support DDC power operations. DDC power operations can cause (even serious) issues with some displays!
trans-unit.target:
Če vaš zaslon ni popolnoma združljiv s to funkcijo, aplikacija morda ne bo mogla izklopiti ali znova vklopiti osvetlitve ozadja!
Vsi zasloni ne podpirajo napajalnih operacij DDC. Napajanje DDC lahko povzroči (celo resne) težave z nekaterimi zasloni!

trans-unit.id: Ignore checksum check error on read
trans-unit.source: Ignore checksum check error on read
trans-unit.target: Prezri napako preverjanja kontrolne vsote pri branju
Prezri za samodejno prekinitev povezave vgrajenega zaslona

trans-unit.id: In a detached state the app menu floats over the desktop as a top-level window. You can specify the alpha level to see-through the menu (lower the value for more transparency).
trans-unit.source: In a detached state the app menu floats over the desktop as a top-level window. You can specify the alpha level to see-through the menu (lower the value for more transparency).
trans-unit.target: V ločenem stanju meni aplikacije lebdi nad namizjem kot okno najvišje ravni. Določite lahko raven alfa za preglednost menija (znižajte vrednost za večjo preglednost).

trans-unit.id: Increase brightness for all displays by some amount.
trans-unit.source: Increase brightness for all displays by some amount.
trans-unit.target: Za določeno količino povečajte svetlost vseh zaslonov.

trans-unit.id: Increase display brightness beyond 100%. Requires an Apple XDR display or a HDR capable external display in HDR mode. The feature works with color table adjustments enabled on Apple Silicon Macs or with it disabled (using Metal based overlay brightness control) on all platforms. Upscaling using Metal may increase CPU and GPU usage on some systems.
trans-unit.source: Increase display brightness beyond 100%. Requires an Apple XDR display or a HDR capable external display in HDR mode. The feature works with color table adjustments enabled on Apple Silicon Macs or with it disabled (using Metal based overlay brightness control) on all platforms. Upscaling using Metal may increase CPU and GPU usage on some systems.
trans-unit.target: Povečajte svetlost zaslona nad 100 %. Potrebuje zaslon Apple XDR ali zunanji zaslon, ki podpira HDR, v načinu HDR. Funkcija deluje z omogočenimi prilagoditvami barvne tabele na računalnikih Apple Silicon Mac ali onemogočenimi (z uporabo nadzora svetlosti prekrivanja na osnovi Metal) na vseh platformah. Višanje ločljivosti z uporabo Metal lahko poveča porabo procesorja in grafičnega procesorja v nekaterih sistemih.

trans-unit.id: Insert intermediate keyboard/OSD step at neutral 100% for HDR upscaling
trans-unit.source: Insert intermediate keyboard/OSD step at neutral 100% for HDR upscaling
trans-unit.target: Vstavite vmesni korak tipkovnice/OSD na nevtralnem 100 % za povečanje HDR

trans-unit.id: Issue mute command first, then set volume level to lowest setting
trans-unit.source: Issue mute command first, then set volume level to lowest setting
trans-unit.target: Najprej izdajte ukaz za izklop zvoka, nato nastavite glasnost na najnižjo nastavitev
Izdaj samo ukaz za izklop zvoka

trans-unit.id: Issue unmute command first, then set volume level
trans-unit.source: Issue unmute command first, then set volume level
trans-unit.target: Najprej izdajte ukaz za vklop zvoka, nato pa nastavite glasnost

trans-unit.id: It is advised to leave this on, especially if the custom EDID alters display identity. Without this the app may detect the display as different upon next startup.
trans-unit.source: It is advised to leave this on, especially if the custom EDID alters display identity. Without this the app may detect the display as different upon next startup.
trans-unit.target: Priporočljivo je, da to možnost pustite vklopljeno, zlasti če EDID po meri spremeni identiteto zaslona. Brez tega lahko aplikacija ob naslednjem zagonu zazna, da je zaslon drugačen.

trans-unit.id: It is best to let the app configure relevant features (contrast, color controls) to have the current value set as default. If the currently displayed image is not optimal, use the display's OSD to fix things first and then run detection again before proceeding!
trans-unit.source: It is best to let the app configure relevant features (contrast, color controls) to have the current value set as default. If the currently displayed image is not optimal, use the display's OSD to fix things first and then run detection again before proceeding!
trans-unit.target: Najbolje je, da aplikaciji dovolite, da konfigurira ustrezne funkcije (kontrast, barvne kontrole), da bo trenutna vrednost nastavljena kot privzeta. Če trenutno prikazana slika ni optimalna, uporabite OSD zaslona, ​​da najprej popravite stvari in nato znova zaženite zaznavanje, preden nadaljujete!

trans-unit.id: Keep Sidecar displays in display list after being disconnected
trans-unit.source: Keep Sidecar displays in display list after being disconnected
trans-unit.target: Ohrani stranske zaslone na seznamu prikazov po prekinitvi povezave
Nadzor s tipkovnico vpliva na ta zaslon

trans-unit.id: Layout protection enforces a configured arrangement for group member displays relative to each other. The feature can be used to make sure the displays are arranged properly after changing display resolutions, connecting new displays that are not part of the display group or dealing with displays that are not properly handled by the built-in display layout management of the operating system.
trans-unit.source: Layout protection enforces a configured arrangement for group member displays relative to each other. The feature can be used to make sure the displays are arranged properly after changing display resolutions, connecting new displays that are not part of the display group or dealing with displays that are not properly handled by the built-in display layout management of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Zaščita postavitve uveljavlja konfigurirano razporeditev medsebojnih prikazov članov skupine. Funkcijo lahko uporabite za zagotovitev, da so zasloni pravilno razporejeni po spreminjanju ločljivosti zaslona, ​​povezovanju novih zaslonov, ki niso del skupine zaslonov, ali obravnavanju zaslonov, ki jih vgrajeno upravljanje postavitve zaslona operacijskega sistema ne obravnava pravilno.

trans-unit.id: Leave mute key under OS control

trans-unit.id: Set the brightness slider as high as possible! Also make sure you still barely see the smiling face! If you don't see the smiling face when the slider is set to the lowest setting, you need to adjust your display's hardware controls (contrast, gamma) first to fix the white saturation problem.
trans-unit.source: Set the brightness slider as high as possible! Also make sure you still barely see the smiling face! If you don't see the smiling face when the slider is set to the lowest setting, you need to adjust your display's hardware controls (contrast, gamma) first to fix the white saturation problem.
trans-unit.target: Drsnik za svetlost nastavite čim višje! Prepričajte se tudi, da še vedno komaj vidite nasmejan obraz! Če ne vidite nasmejanega obraza, ko je drsnik nastavljen na najnižjo nastavitev, morate najprej prilagoditi nastavitve strojne opreme zaslona (kontrast, gama), da odpravite težavo z nasičenostjo beline.
Nastavitev dovoljenj za ljudi s posebnimi potrebami ...

trans-unit.id: Sets the minimum allowed hardware brightness value (on its own scale) below which software dimming kicks-in when using combined brightness control. This setting is useful for those with PWM sensitivity as it prohibits backlight control from entering heavy PWM range, substituting it with software dimming instead.
trans-unit.source: Sets the minimum allowed hardware brightness value (on its own scale) below which software dimming kicks-in when using combined brightness control. This setting is useful for those with PWM sensitivity as it prohibits backlight control from entering heavy PWM range, substituting it with software dimming instead.
trans-unit.target: Nastavi najmanjšo dovoljeno vrednost svetlosti strojne opreme (na lastni lestvici), pod katero se sproži programsko zatemnitev pri uporabi kombiniranega nadzora svetlosti. Ta nastavitev je uporabna za tiste z občutljivostjo PWM, saj nadzoru osvetlitve ozadja prepoveduje vstop v močno območje PWM in ga nadomesti s programsko zatemnitvijo.

trans-unit.id: Show disconnect/connect menu option for displays. Disconnecting a display puts the display into sleep mode and removes it from the display layout. Connecting it restores the display. Disconnected displays can be reconnected with the header toggle (power button), by turning the display on/off or closing and opening the lid for MacBook displays.
trans-unit.source: Show disconnect/connect menu option for displays. Disconnecting a display puts the display into sleep mode and removes it from the display layout. Connecting it restores the display. Disconnected displays can be reconnected with the header toggle (power button), by turning the display on/off or closing and opening the lid for MacBook displays.
trans-unit.target: Pokaži možnost menija za prekinitev/povezavo za zaslone. Prekinitev povezave z zaslonom preklopi zaslon v način mirovanja in ga odstrani iz postavitve zaslona. Priključitev povrne zaslon. Odklopljene zaslone lahko ponovno povežete s preklopom glave (gumb za vklop), tako da vklopite/izklopite zaslon ali zaprete in odprete pokrov za zaslone MacBook.

trans-unit.source: Software control allows dimming even without hardware support and provides various other video adjustments. Required for combined brightness and XDR/HDR upscaling.

Nekateri zasloni so še vedno odklopljeni!

trans-unit.id: Some displays do not support DDC brightness control in HDR mode. Enabling this for compatible displays allows brightness control while preserving unclipped HDR content.
trans-unit.source: Some displays do not support DDC brightness control in HDR mode. Enabling this for compatible displays allows brightness control while preserving unclipped HDR content.

trans-unit.source: Some displays forget changes made via DDC commands after sleep. With this enabled, the app reapplies DDC settings every time the display wakes.

trans-unit.id: Some displays require an SCS (Save Current Settings) signal after DDC write so the operation takes effect. For the overwhelming majority of displays it is best to leave this setting off.
trans-unit.source: Some displays require an SCS (Save Current Settings) signal after DDC write so the operation takes effect. For the overwhelming majority of displays it is best to leave this setting off.
trans-unit.target: Nekateri zasloni zahtevajo signal SCS (Shrani trenutne nastavitve) po pisanju DDC, da začne operacija veljati. Za veliko večino zaslonov je najbolje, da to nastavitev pustite izklopljeno.

trans-unit.id: Synchronize value changes (delta) from sources to targets. This helps keep initial value differences between source and target (until minimum or maximum is reached). When this is disabled, absolute values are synced.
trans-unit.source: Synchronize value changes (delta) from sources to targets. This helps keep initial value differences between source and target (until minimum or maximum is reached). When this is disabled, absolute values are synced.

trans-unit.id: The DDC reset command might not work properly for all displays. You can also try using the built-in factory reset functionality of the display (usually accessible via the display OSD).

trans-unit.id: The app automatically attempts to reconnect all displays when no connected display is present.

trans-unit.id: The app can automatically connect and disconnect a virtual screen based on the availability of the display(s) it is associated with. It can also auto-start mirroring or streaming or follow the associated display's orientation.
trans-unit.source: The app can automatically connect and disconnect a virtual screen based on the availability of the display(s) it is associated with. It can also auto-start mirroring or streaming or follow the associated display's orientation.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacija lahko samodejno poveže in prekine povezavo z virtualnim zaslonom glede na razpoložljivost zaslona(-ov), s katerim(-i) je povezana. Prav tako lahko samodejno zažene zrcaljenje ali pretakanje ali sledi usmerjenosti povezanega zaslona.

trans-unit.id: The app menu icon will reflect the icon of the current main display. Enable if you don't like the default icon…
trans-unit.source: The app menu icon will reflect the icon of the current main display. Enable if you don't like the default icon…
trans-unit.target: Ikona menija aplikacije bo odražala ikono trenutnega glavnega zaslona. Omogočite, če vam privzeta ikona ni všeč ...

trans-unit.id: The app menu will show this name instead of the system name for the display. If you want to change the system-wide name, you can do so by enabling the configuration override option and editing the system display name.
trans-unit.source: The app menu will show this name instead of the system name for the display. If you want to change the system-wide name, you can do so by enabling the configuration override option and editing the system display name.
trans-unit.target: Meni aplikacije bo prikazal to ime namesto imena sistema za zaslon. Če želite spremeniti sistemsko ime, lahko to storite tako, da omogočite možnost preglasitve konfiguracije in uredite prikazno ime sistema.

trans-unit.id: The app normally does not restore full dimming upon wake or app startup to avoid confusion.
trans-unit.source: The app normally does not restore full dimming upon wake or app startup to avoid confusion.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacija običajno ne obnovi popolne zatemnitve ob prebujanju ali zagonu aplikacije, da prepreči zmedo.

trans-unit.id: The app was launched using Rosetta. Some features won't work.
trans-unit.source: The app was launched using Rosetta. Some features won't work.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacija je bila zagnana s pomočjo Rosetta. Nekatere funkcije ne bodo delovale.

trans-unit.id: The app will apply the loaded EDID when this display is connected. The operation causes the screen to flicker and switch modes if existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. If the new EDID has different id data (vendor, model, serial), the display will be redetected as a different one. Hold ⇧ Shift on startup to enable safe mode and avoid auto-apply. Physically reconnect display to revert back to the original in case of serious trouble.
trans-unit.source: The app will apply the loaded EDID when this display is connected. The operation causes the screen to flicker and switch modes if existing mode is not available with the updated EDID. If the new EDID has different id data (vendor, model, serial), the display will be redetected as a different one. Hold ⇧ Shift on startup to enable safe mode and avoid auto-apply. Physically reconnect display to revert back to the original in case of serious trouble.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacija bo uporabila naložen EDID, ko bo ta zaslon povezan. Operacija povzroči utripanje zaslona in zamenjavo načinov, če obstoječi način ni na voljo s posodobljenim EDID. Če ima novi EDID drugačne ID podatke (prodajalec, model, serija), bo zaslon ponovno zaznan kot drug. Držite ⇧ Shift ob zagonu, da omogočite varni način in se izognete samodejni uporabi. Ponovno fizično povežite zaslon, da se v primeru resnih težav povrnete na izvirnik.

trans-unit.id:
The app will forget all stored DDC values and treat all controls as untouched. Sliders will revert to default neutral values.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.source:
The app will forget all stored DDC values and treat all controls as untouched. Sliders will revert to default neutral values.
This operation does not reset the display itself.

Aplikacija bo pozabila vse shranjene vrednosti DDC in vse kontrole obravnavala kot nedotaknjene. Drsniki se bodo vrnili na privzete nevtralne vrednosti.
Ta postopek ne ponastavi samega zaslona.

trans-unit.id:
The app will reset all DDC feature settings to its defaults.
This operation does not reset the display itself.

The app will reset all DDC feature settings to its defaults.
This operation does not reset the display itself.
trans-unit.target:
Aplikacija bo ponastavila vse nastavitve funkcij DDC na privzete vrednosti.
Ta postopek ne ponastavi samega zaslona.

trans-unit.id: The built-in display is configured to be disconnected when an external display is connected. This setting will be re-enabled when the built-in display is manually disconnected again or the app is restarted.
trans-unit.source: The built-in display is configured to be disconnected when an external display is connected. This setting will be re-enabled when the built-in display is manually disconnected again or the app is restarted.

trans-unit.id: The built-in display of the iMac cannot be easily reconnected (lack of display cable, closable lid) in case of an application failure. Enable this setting with extra caution!
trans-unit.source: The built-in display of the iMac cannot be easily reconnected (lack of display cable, closable lid) in case of an application failure. Enable this setting with extra caution!

trans-unit.id: The default input source list reflects commonly occurring assignments, but the actual list varies by display vendor/model. Try using the "LG alt" toggle for some newer LG displays if input control does not work!

trans-unit.source: The display may not be properly configured for DDC hardware brightness control and other similar features. Use detection and auto-configuration or adjust DDC settings manually.

trans-unit.source: The display will be automatically disconnected upon detection or physical connect if it was disconnected using the app beforehand. This setting might cause unexpected issues (connect-disconnect cycle with incompatible displays, lack of any connected displays) - use with caution!

trans-unit.source: The duplicated group will be disabled by default.

V primeru okvare odklopite in ponovno fizično priključite zaslon.

trans-unit.id: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the 'display physical dimensions' setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.source: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the 'display physical dimensions' setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.target: Fizična dimenzija (ki se uporablja za izračun skaliranja uporabniškega vmesnika), povezana z virtualnim zaslonom, je določena predvsem z nastavitvijo 'sporočene diagonalne velikosti', ki jo je mogoče dodatno spremeniti z nastavitvijo 'prikaži fizične dimenzije', ko je virtualni zaslon povezan.

trans-unit.id: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the `display physical dimensions` setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.source: The physical dimension (used to calculate UI scaling) associated with a virtual screen is determined primarily by the 'reported diagonal size' setting which can be further modified by the `display physical dimensions` setting when the virtual screen is connected.
trans-unit.target: Fizična dimenzija (ki se uporablja za izračun skaliranja uporabniškega vmesnika), povezana z virtualnim zaslonom, je določena predvsem z nastavitvijo 'sporočene diagonalne velikosti', ki jo je mogoče dodatno spremeniti z nastavitvijo 'prikaži fizične dimenzije', ko je virtualni zaslon povezan.

trans-unit.id: The slider will omit resolutions that do not match the display's size in order to reduce clutter and make slider easier to use. Affects resolution keyboard shortcuts as well.
trans-unit.source: The slider will omit resolutions that do not match the display's size in order to reduce clutter and make slider easier to use. Affects resolution keyboard shortcuts as well.

trans-unit.id: The system might reconnect the built-in display and other displays after wake from sleep to ensure GUI access. With this option enabled, the app forcefully disconnects these displays again. Post-wake main display will not be disconnected.
trans-unit.source: The system might reconnect the built-in display and other displays after wake from sleep to ensure GUI access. With this option enabled, the app forcefully disconnects these displays again. Post-wake main display will not be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Sistem lahko po prebujanju iz spanja znova poveže vgrajeni zaslon in druge zaslone, da zagotovi dostop do GUI. Ko je ta možnost omogočena, aplikacija znova prisilno prekine povezavo s temi zasloni. Glavni zaslon po prebujanju ne bo prekinjen.

trans-unit.id: The time it takes for the app to enter into an active state after the system wakes from a sleep.
trans-unit.source: The time it takes for the app to enter into an active state after the system wakes from a sleep.
trans-unit.target: Čas, ki je potreben, da aplikacija preide v aktivno stanje, potem ko se sistem prebudi iz stanja spanja.

trans-unit.id: The time it takes for the app to respond to a configuration change.
trans-unit.source: The time it takes for the app to respond to a configuration change.
trans-unit.target: Čas, potreben, da se aplikacija odzove na spremembo konfiguracije.

trans-unit.id: The virtual screen created with this aspect ratio does not seem to be viable.
trans-unit.source: The virtual screen created with this aspect ratio does not seem to be viable.

trans-unit.source: The virtual screen is now associated with a display and to comply with association settings, the virtual screen should automatically change its connection status. Alternatively you can disable auto-connect (it can be enabled any time under association settings).

trans-unit.id: The virtual screen was not created.
trans-unit.source: The virtual screen was not created.

trans-unit.source: The ⇧ Shift key was pressed during launch. The app started in safe mode.

trans-unit.id: There are not at least two display group members present.
trans-unit.source: There are not at least two display group members present.

trans-unit.source: There are some unapplied system configuration changes.

trans-unit.source: There is at least one controllable display connected
trans-unit.target: Povezan je vsaj en upravljalni zaslon

trans-unit.id: There is no group member present.
trans-unit.source: There is no group member present.

trans-unit.id: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serve as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.
trans-unit.source: These three identifiers (serial number, vendor and model ID) serve as the basis for display identification in macOS. If any of these three identifiers are changed, the system will assign a new identity (UUID) to the virtual screen and treat it as newly connected display.
trans-unit.target: Ti trije identifikatorji (serijska številka, prodajalec in ID modela) služijo kot osnova za identifikacijo zaslona v macOS. Če se kateri koli od teh treh identifikatorjev spremeni, bo sistem virtualnemu zaslonu dodelil novo identiteto (UUID) in ga obravnaval kot na novo povezan zaslon.

trans-unit.id: This allows additional image adjustment control options when color table adjustments are not enabled or available. Comes with a slight performance penalty. This feature is always active when software brightness upscaling is turned on while color table adjustments are not available.
trans-unit.source: This allows additional image adjustment control options when color table adjustments are not enabled or available. Comes with a slight performance penalty. This feature is always active when software brightness upscaling is turned on while color table adjustments are not available.
trans-unit.target: To omogoča dodatne možnosti nadzora prilagoditve slike, ko prilagoditve barvne tabele niso omogočene ali na voljo. Prihaja z rahlo zmanjšano zmogljivostjo. Ta funkcija je vedno aktivna, ko je vklopljeno programsko povečanje svetlosti, medtem ko prilagoditve barvne tabele niso na voljo.

trans-unit.id: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.source: This allows advanced dimming, color adjustments and other features like software XDR/HDR upscaling. Note: color adjustments clip HDR content when in active use. If this option is disabled, the app will fall back to overlay based dimming control and uses Metal for software XDR/HDR upscaling.
trans-unit.target: To omogoča napredno zatemnitev, barvne prilagoditve in druge funkcije, kot je programsko povečanje XDR/HDR. Opomba: prilagoditve barv posnamejo vsebino HDR, ko je v aktivni uporabi. Če je ta možnost onemogočena, se bo aplikacija vrnila na nadzor zatemnitve na podlagi prekrivanja in uporabila Metal za programsko nadgradnjo XDR/HDR.

trans-unit.id: This applies both to physically connecting an external display and using the app to reconnect one. However, the app will not reconnect the built-in display if you allow all displays to be disconnected!
trans-unit.source: This applies both to physically connecting an external display and using the app to reconnect one. However, the app will not reconnect the built-in display if you allow all displays to be disconnected!
trans-unit.target: To velja za fizično povezovanje zunanjega zaslona in uporabo aplikacije za ponovno povezavo. Vendar pa aplikacija ne bo znova povezala vgrajenega zaslona, ​​če dovolite, da so vsi zasloni prekinjeni!

trans-unit.id: This can be a result of disabled DDC/CI support (check the display's OSD), display firmware limitations or connection issues. Many TVs and TV-derived smart monitors do not support DDC. If the issue cannot be resolved either by changing display settings or fixing cable issues, you should disable DDC support.
trans-unit.source: This can be a result of disabled DDC/CI support (check the display's OSD), display firmware limitations or connection issues. Many TVs and TV-derived smart monitors do not support DDC. If the issue cannot be resolved either by changing display settings or fixing cable issues, you should disable DDC support.
trans-unit.target: To je lahko posledica onemogočene podpore DDC/CI (preverite OSD zaslona), omejitev vdelane programske opreme zaslona ali težav s povezavo. Številni televizorji in pametni monitorji, ki izhajajo iz televizorjev, ne podpirajo DDC. Če težave ni mogoče rešiti s spreminjanjem nastavitev zaslona ali odpravljanjem težav s kablom, onemogočite podporo za DDC.

trans-unit.id: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With port and location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.
trans-unit.source: This configures how the data associated with the currently configured display is matched to a detected display during the configuration/detection process. Changing this setting might cause a display to be recognized as previously unconnected and disassociate existing saved display configuration data. System UUID match uses the MacOS default identification. When set to use basic identifiers, the app identifies the display by its vendor/model IDs and serial number. With extended it also uses product name, alphanumeric serial number, and production date. With port and location the app also considers hardware connectivity data.
trans-unit.target: To konfigurira, kako se podatki, povezani s trenutno konfiguriranim zaslonom, ujemajo z zaznanim zaslonom med postopkom konfiguracije/zaznavanja. Spreminjanje te nastavitve lahko povzroči, da bo zaslon prepoznan kot prej nepovezan, in prekine povezavo med obstoječimi shranjenimi konfiguracijskimi podatki zaslona. Ujemanje UUID sistema uporablja privzeto identifikacijo MacOS. Ko je nastavljena na uporabo osnovnih identifikatorjev, aplikacija prepozna zaslon po ID-ju prodajalca/modela in serijski številki. Z razširjenim uporablja tudi ime izdelka, alfanumerično serijsko številko in datum proizvodnje. Pri vratih in lokaciji aplikacija upošteva tudi podatke o povezljivosti strojne opreme.

trans-unit.source: Virtual screens can be connected/disconnected on demand any time. Some settings appear only when the screen is connected. Changing some of the settings below require the screen to be reconnected when it is already connected.

trans-unit.id: Wait time between backlight state change operations
trans-unit.source: Wait time between backlight state change operations

trans-unit.source: Wait time for response on read

trans-unit.id: Watch all group members for resolution changes
trans-unit.source: Watch all group members for resolution changes
trans-unit.target: Opazujte vse člane skupine glede sprememb ločljivosti

trans-unit.id: Watch for resolution changes made outside of the app
trans-unit.source: Watch for resolution changes made outside of the app
trans-unit.target: Bodite pozorni na spremembe ločljivosti zunaj aplikacije

trans-unit.id: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.source: When HDR upscaling is enabled while hardware brightness control is disabled, the app uses a continuous brightness scale between zero and the calibrated max upscale value. Due to this the neutral setting (100% brightness, when on-screen HDR content is unclipped) might not fall to an OSD chiclet boundary which makes it difficult to attain via the shortcut keys. To fix this an additional mid-chiclet step at 100% brightness is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Ko je omogočeno povečanje HDR, medtem ko je nadzor svetlosti strojne opreme onemogočen, aplikacija uporablja neprekinjeno lestvico svetlosti med ničlo in umerjeno največjo vrednostjo povečanja. Zaradi tega nevtralna nastavitev (100-odstotna svetlost, ko vsebina HDR na zaslonu ni odrezana) morda ne bo padla na mejo zaslonskega menija, zaradi česar jo je težko doseči z bližnjičnimi tipkami. Da bi to popravili, je vstavljen dodaten srednji korak pri 100-odstotni svetlosti.

trans-unit.id: When a watched display's resolution changes, the resolution of all suitable group members are updated as a consequence to match the UI scaling of the watched display.
trans-unit.source: When a watched display's resolution changes, the resolution of all suitable group members are updated as a consequence to match the UI scaling of the watched display.
trans-unit.target: Ko se spremeni ločljivost opazovanega zaslona, ​​se posledično posodobi ločljivost vseh ustreznih članov skupine, da se ujemajo s skaliranjem uporabniškega vmesnika opazovanega zaslona.

trans-unit.id: When enabled, this display will not trigger the disconnection of the built-in display when it is set to disconnect upon the connection of an external display.
trans-unit.source: When enabled, this display will not trigger the disconnection of the built-in display when it is set to disconnect upon the connection of an external display.
trans-unit.target: Ko je omogočen, ta zaslon ne bo sprožil prekinitve povezave z vgrajenim zaslonom, če je nastavljen na prekinitev povezave ob povezavi zunanjega zaslona.

trans-unit.id: When expanding a menu item, automatically hide other items under the given device / menu block. This helps keep the menu smaller.
trans-unit.source: When expanding a menu item, automatically hide other items under the given device / menu block. This helps keep the menu smaller.
trans-unit.target: Ko razširite element menija, samodejno skrijete druge elemente pod dano napravo/blokom menija. To pomaga, da je meni manjši.

trans-unit.id: When the display is set as main, the lower limit is 30% for combined or software brightness, 10% for Apple hardware brightness, 0% for DDC hardware brightness.
trans-unit.source: When the display is set as main, the lower limit is 30% for combined or software brightness, 10% for Apple hardware brightness, 0% for DDC hardware brightness.
trans-unit.target: Ko je zaslon nastavljen kot glavni, je spodnja meja 30 % za kombinirano ali programsko svetlost, 10 % za svetlost strojne opreme Apple, 0 % za svetlost strojne opreme DDC.

trans-unit.id: When this is enabled, syncing won't affect displays in HDR mode or XDR displays set to a reference XDR preset.
trans-unit.source: When this is enabled, syncing won't affect displays in HDR mode or XDR displays set to a reference XDR preset.
trans-unit.target: Ko je to omogočeno, sinhronizacija ne bo vplivala na zaslone v načinu HDR ali zaslone XDR, nastavljene na referenčno prednastavitev XDR.

trans-unit.id: When this is enabled, the app will use DDC brightness for combined brightness control instead of the SDR peak brightness adjustment control (HDR brightness control) provided by macOS. You can still adjust the SDR peak brightness in Control Center - these adjustments will influence the upscaling (if available) headroom provided by the app. Not all displays support DDC brightness control in HDR mode.
trans-unit.source: When this is enabled, the app will use DDC brightness for combined brightness control instead of the SDR peak brightness adjustment control (HDR brightness control) provided by macOS. You can still adjust the SDR peak brightness in Control Center - these adjustments will influence the upscaling (if available) headroom provided by the app. Not all displays support DDC brightness control in HDR mode.
trans-unit.target: Ko je to omogočeno, bo aplikacija uporabljala svetlost DDC za kombinirani nadzor svetlosti namesto nadzora prilagoditve največje svetlosti SDR (nadzor svetlosti HDR), ki ga zagotavlja macOS. Najvišjo svetlost SDR lahko še vedno prilagodite v Nadzornem centru – te prilagoditve bodo vplivale na višino povečanja (če je na voljo), ki jo zagotavlja aplikacija. Vsi zasloni ne podpirajo nadzora svetlosti DDC v načinu HDR.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled Sidecar displays disconnected using the app will remain in the display list for easy reconnect. Sidecar displays disconnected outside of the app or before app startup are not listed.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled Sidecar displays disconnected using the app will remain in the display list for easy reconnect. Sidecar displays disconnected outside of the app or before app startup are not listed.
trans-unit.target: Ko je to omogočeno, bodo zasloni Sidecar, odklopljeni z aplikacijo, ostali na seznamu zaslonov za preprosto ponovno povezavo. Stranski zasloni, odklopljeni zunaj aplikacije ali pred zagonom aplikacije, niso navedeni.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled scale matching will affect displays that have resolution configuration protection enabled. The protected resolution will be updated as well.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled scale matching will affect displays that have resolution configuration protection enabled. The protected resolution will be updated as well.
trans-unit.target: Če je to omogočeno, bo ujemanje lestvice vplivalo na zaslone, ki imajo omogočeno zaščito konfiguracije ločljivosti. Posodobljena bo tudi zaščitena ločljivost.

trans-unit.id: With this enabled the app will perform the scale matching operation when the resolution of a watched display was changed by the system or by some other app. If the resolution of multiple watched displays are changed (for example, because of a layout change), no action is taken to avoid ambiguity.
trans-unit.source: With this enabled the app will perform the scale matching operation when the resolution of a watched display was changed by the system or by some other app. If the resolution of multiple watched displays are changed (for example, because of a layout change), no action is taken to avoid ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: Če je to omogočeno, bo aplikacija izvedla operacijo ujemanja lestvice, ko je sistem ali katera druga aplikacija spremenila ločljivost gledanega zaslona. Če se spremeni ločljivost več gledanih zaslonov (na primer zaradi spremembe postavitve), se ne izvede noben ukrep, da bi se izognili dvoumnosti.

trans-unit.id: With this option selected, the app will leave native brightness keys under macOS control if only Apple displays are connected with no additional software brightness control features enabled. In this case however various settings (like "Make fine scale default" or control "All suitable screens" simultaneously) that modify the default behavior of the brightness keys will not apply.
trans-unit.source: With this option selected, the app will leave native brightness keys under macOS control if only Apple displays are connected with no additional software brightness control features enabled. In this case however various settings (like "Make fine scale default" or control "All suitable screens" simultaneously) that modify the default behavior of the brightness keys will not apply.
trans-unit.target: Ko je izbrana ta možnost, bo aplikacija pustila izvorne tipke za svetlost pod nadzorom macOS, če so povezani samo zasloni Apple brez omogočenih dodatnih programskih funkcij za nadzor svetlosti. Vendar pa v tem primeru različne nastavitve (na primer »Nastavi fino lestvico za privzeto« ali hkrati upravljajte »Vsi primerni zasloni«), ki spreminjajo privzeto obnašanje tipk za svetlost, ne bodo veljale.

trans-unit.id: Without Screen Recording permissions this feature will not work!
trans-unit.source: Without Screen Recording permissions this feature will not work!

trans-unit.source: XDR displays use XDR Presets to manage display color reproduction, gamma, white point settings. Color Profiles can still be used to influence rendering to a limited extent however XDR presets work best when the factory default Color Profile is configured for the XDR display.

Barvne profile je še vedno mogoče uporabiti za vplivanje na upodabljanje v omejenem obsegu, vendar prednastavitve XDR delujejo najbolje, če je tovarniško privzeti barvni profil konfiguriran za zaslon XDR.

trans-unit.id:
⚠️ An EDID write operation modifies the EDID and DisplayID data on the device itself. Erroneous EDID data or a problem during EDID write might render the display permanently unusable!
Most displays do not allow EDID write for security reasons, some displays require EDID write to be activated in a service menu. Most EDID emulators or pass-thru dongles support EDID write. EDID write (if supported) usually works over HDMI.
trans-unit.source:
⚠️ An EDID write operation modifies the EDID and DisplayID data on the device itself. Erroneous EDID data or a problem during EDID write might render the display permanently unusable!
Most displays do not allow EDID write for security reasons, some displays require EDID write to be activated in a service menu. Most EDID emulators or pass-thru dongles support EDID write. EDID write (if supported) usually works over HDMI.
trans-unit.target:
⚠️ Operacija pisanja EDID spremeni podatke EDID in DisplayID na sami napravi. Zaradi napačnih podatkov EDID ali težave med zapisovanjem EDID lahko zaslon postane trajno neuporaben!
Večina zaslonov ne dovoljuje zapisovanja EDID iz varnostnih razlogov, nekateri zasloni zahtevajo aktiviranje zapisovanja EDID v servisnem meniju. Večina emulatorjev EDID ali prehodnih ključkov podpira pisanje EDID. Zapis EDID (če je podprt) običajno deluje prek HDMI.

trans-unit.target: ⚠️ V veljavi je nadomestna identiteta EDID - spremembe sistemske konfiguracije bodo povezane s to identiteto!

trans-unit.id: ⚠️ For this XDR display it best to set calibration to Default - Auto Calibrate so the app can automatically adapt upscaling to the currently selected XDR preset and environmental factors. For manual calibration set the brightness slider as high as possible while also making sure you still see the smiling face!
trans-unit.source: ⚠️ For this XDR display it best to set calibration to Default - Auto Calibrate so the app can automatically adapt upscaling to the currently selected XDR preset and environmental factors. For manual calibration set the brightness slider as high as possible while also making sure you still see the smiling face!

Za ročno kalibracijo nastavite drsnik za svetlost čim višje, hkrati pa poskrbite, da še vedno vidite nasmejan obraz!

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If a third party app (like MediaMate) is being used to show the OSD, you might want to disable the built-in OSD under Keyboard/OSD to avoid having duplicated or mixed-style OSDs presented!
